summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackI'm From Rice Whip Facial Cleanser is a gentle Korean foaming face wash enriched with Yeoju rice extract and rice bran. It deeply cleanses while locking in moisture and protecting skin from environmental stressâ€”perfect for dry, dull, or sensitive skin types.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently removes impurities without stripping skinBoosts hydration and prevents moisture lossBrightens dull, tired-looking skinProtects against environmental damageLeaves skin soft, smooth, and refreshedKey IngredientsYeoju Rice Extract - Hydrates and nourishes to maintain optimal moisture levelsRice Bran Extract - Rich in antioxidants to protect against free radical damageGlycerin - Draws moisture into skin for long-lasting hydrationAllantoin - Calms and soothes irritated or sensitive skinCocamidopropyl Betaine - A gentle cleansing agent derived from coconut for soft, non-stripping foamItem 2642142How To UseLather an appropriate amount on wet hands and gently massage on damp face. Rinse off with lukewarm water.IngredientsGlycerin, Water, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Myristic Acid, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Niacinamide, Methylpropanediol, Polyquaternium-7, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Disodium EDTA, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Steareth-30, Caramel, Sodium Benzoate, Dextrin.
how_to_use: Lather an appropriate amount on wet hands and gently massage on damp face. Rinse off with lukewarm water.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Lathers up really nicely so that you don't have to use much. Cleans skin well without stripping the natural oils! Highly reccomend!

reviews.headline: Debating even using what I bought
reviews.comments:
Someone gifted me the toner and I loved it so I tried the face wash and toner and mositizer.
Unfortunately I've had more acne on my jawline then ever before! Im not even sure if I should finish using what I have or get rid of it and try something new ðŸ˜­ðŸ«

faceoff_positive.comments: Upgrade your skincare routine with Rice Line. Cleanse with Rice Whip Cleanser, then tone with Rice Toner. Repeat for a MoistuRICE & Shining complexion! I have been loving n using rice toner for a few months, and I can recommend it to all for glowy,hydrated plump skin. And it was a great release that now I can pair toner with the rice water cleanser to double the shine and glow. Benefits of Rice Water Cleansing 1. It even out and illuminates the skin tone, giving that glass skin effect. 2. It improves skin elasticity and works on anti aging, wrinkles since dry skin is one of main reason for aging quickly. 3. It Delivers rich nutrients to the skin 4. Soft and creamy texture, very similar to whipped cream, it instantly creates a rich and dense bubble foam for deep cleansing, and it smells subtle, and skin feels soft afterward. 5. It is deep cleaning & and moisturizing too, very efficiently works on pores, sunscreen and makeup, th3 skin doeant feels tight or very dry because the rice extracts keep skin hydrated. 6. It also works on the skin texture , it Smoothen rough skin with a blend of AHA, BHA, PHA, LHA, and rice bran extract to gently exfoliate and soften the skin. It is Suitable for all skin types , even sensitive skin. Irritant-free formula.
